title: Pembamoto Regreening
description: This collection consists of one Planetscope scene and one SkySat collect used in [a lab exercise from Esri](https://learn.arcgis.com/en/projects/explore-imagery-spatial-resolution/), in partnership with Planet, which is designed to give new users a basic understanding of the role of spatial resolution in satellite data. All images are of the Pembamoto region, in Tanzania, from 2022 to 2023 and show the effects of a regreening project undertaken by the NGO, [Justdigit](https://justdiggit.org/).
